title: Vathil-Malayalam
description: Like the other books of Fr.bobby Jose,its smooth flowing river of knowledge.The more deeper we fall in to sweeter it turns out to be.Your words always rhyme in my heart and encourage me to search the purpose of my life and reminds me that life is not merely money and knowledge.
author: ബോബി ജോസ് കട്ടികാട് | Bobby Jose Kattikadu
